T02TD1455E:3b-0: @3b ` // 'khor lo bde mchog gi rgyun bshags bzhugs /
T02TD1455E:3b-2: # // bcom ldan phyogs kyi zhal bzhi phyag bcu gnyis //
T02TD1455E:3b-3: bcu gnyis phyag gis glang chen pags sogs bsnams //
T02TD1455E:3b-4: bde gshegs drug 'gyur phyag rgya drug gis brgyan //
T02TD1455E:3b-5: rdo rje phag mo sku rgyan bde ba mchog la rol //
T02TD1455E:3b-6: mkha' 'grol sogs tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor //
T02TD1455E:3b-7: mkha' sogs sa dang de bzhin sa 'og bcas //
T02TD1455E:3b-8: 'jig rten gsum mchog 'khor bcas pa zhugs so 'tshal //
T02TD1455E:3b-9: ye shes rdo rje dam can dgongs su gsol //
T02TD1455E:3b-10: thog ma med nas skye ba 'di bar du /
T02TD1455E:3b-11: shin tu mi bzang 'khor bar bdag 'khyams pas //
T02TD1455E:3b-12: bskal ba'i dus mtha' bstan pa'i snyigs ma la //
T02TD1455E:3b-13: khyed kyi zhal gyi 'od zer glog tsam mthong //
T02TD1455E:3b-14: sngon gyi 'phro dang khyed kyi thugs rje yis sa /
T02TD1455E:3b-15: theg pa mchog gyur bla na med pa dang //
T02TD1455E:3b-16: gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i don chen 'di //
T02TD1455E:4a-1: ngan bdag gis spyad cing bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02TD1455E:4a-2: bdag gis khas blangs dam bcas tshun chad du //
T02TD1455E:4a-3: bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du ma gyur kyang //
T02TD1455E:4a-4: dam tshig mi 'da' bde gshegs bka' mi slu //
T02TD1455E:4a-5: mngon sum zhal bzhin rtag tu khyed la dgongs //
T02TD1455E:4a-6: nyon mongs rang bzhin rnam shes ma sbyangs par //
T02TD1455E:4a-7: khyed kyi sku gsung thugs ni ma mthong yang //
T02TD1455E:4a-8: khyed kyi bka' las bdag ni mi 'da' na //
T02TD1455E:4a-9: bka' yi byin rlabs bdag la grub par mdzod //
T02TD1455E:4a-10: bdag gi rang bzhin khyed dang yongs su mnyam //
T02TD1455E:4a-11: ma lus 'gro tshogs rnams kyang de bzhin lags //
T02TD1455E:4a-12: bdag gis lus kyis nyes pa ci spyad pa //
T02TD1455E:4a-13: sku yi dkyil 'khor tshogs la bzod par gsol //
T02TD1455E:4a-14: bdag med tshul gyis ngag gis nyes smras pa //
T02TD1455E:4a-15: rig sngags lha yi snying po phyag rgya dag / rgyun mi 'chad par yongs su spyad pa las //
T02TD1455E:4a-16: nyams gyur gsung gi tshogs la bzod par gsol //
T02TD1455E:4a-17: bdag gi yid kyis gzhan gyi nyes bsams shing //
T02TD1455E:4a-18: ting 'dzin lta spyod lha dang slob dpon dang //
T02TD1455E:4a-19: rig sngags lha yi snying po'i phyag rgya dag / rgyun mi 'chang bar tshogs la bzod par gsol //
T02TD1455E:4a-20: slob dpon brnyas shing bka' las 'das pa dang //
T02TD1455E:4a-21: spun la nyes smras byams pa chen po spangs //
T02TD1455E:4a-22: byang chub sems spangs theg pa gsum spangs smod //
T02TD1455E:4a-23: skal min gsang bsgrags bdag nyid phud po smad //
T02TD1455E:4a-24: chos la yid gnyis sdug la chags bral byams //
T02TD1455E:4a-25: chos la gnyis 'byed dang pa'i sems la smod //
T02TD1455E:4a-26: dam tshig ji bzhin bsnyad pa mi bsten dang //
T02TD1455E:4a-27: brtags pa'i rig ma smad par byed pa dang //
T02TD1455E:4a-28: rtsa ba 'di nyams khyed la bzod par gsol //
T02TD1455E:4a-29: dam tshig mi ldan rig ma bsten bar dga' //
T02TD1455E:4a-30: dkyil 'khor tshogs rtsod gsang ba'i chos ston dang //
T02TD1455E:4a-31: sems can dang pa la dam tshig gzhan du ston //
T02TD1455E:4a-32: nyan thos dag dang lhan cig gnas byed cing //
T02TD1455E:4a-33: sbyor ba ma byas snod min gsang ba ston //
T02TD1455E:4a-34: phyag rgya mi shes phyag rgya bsten pa dang //
T02TD1455E:4a-35: bsnyen pa dag par ma byas dkyil 'khor zhugs //
T02TD1455E:4a-36: sngom pa gnyis kyi bcas pa dgos med pas //
T02TD1455E:4a-37: yan lag dam tshig 'di las 'gal bgyis pa'i //
T02TD1455E:4a-38: bka' chad gnas su gyur pa ci mchis pa //
T02TD1455E:4b-0: bzod par gsol lo @4b tshangs par stsal du gsol //
T02TD1455E:4b-1: da lta'i dus su bstan pa 'jig dus su //
T02TD1455E:4b-2: nyon mongs shas chan khyed kyis rab tu mkhyen //
T02TD1455E:4b-3: so sor thugs dam bzhin du nyer dgongs la //
T02TD1455E:4b-4: ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du phrin las mdzod //
T02TD1455E:4b-5: ji ltar bu yis rab tu mi shes kyang //
T02TD1455E:4b-6: pha yis brtse bas legs bar skyong ba ltar ;
T02TD1455E:4b-7: / bdag gis gzhung 'di rab tu ma shes kyang //
T02TD1455E:4b-8: thugs rje chen pos yongs su gzung du gsol //
T02TD1455E:4b-9: dpal 'khor lo bde mchog gi rgyun bshags bsdus pa /
T02TD1455E:4b-10: dpal aoo dya na lha mo'i gnas pa rgyal po aindra bh'u tis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
